# Metrics
This document enumerates the metrics collected by this project.
This project may depend on other projects which also collect metrics.
This means you might have to go searching through the dependency tree to get a full picture of everything collected by this project.
Sorry about that.

# Pings

 - [all_pings](#all_pings)
 - [baseline](#baseline)
 - [glean_client_info](#glean_client_info)
 - [metrics](#metrics)


## all_pings
The following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| glean.error.invalid_label |[labeled_counter](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/labeled_counters.html) |Counts the number of times a metric was set with an invalid label. The labels are the `category.name` identifier of the metric. |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1499761#c5)||never |
| glean.error.invalid_value |[labeled_counter](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/labeled_counters.html) |Counts the number of times a metric was set to an invalid value. The labels are the `category.name` identifier of the metric. |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1499761#c5)||never |

## baseline
This is a built-in ping that is assembled out of the box by the Glean SDK.
See the Glean SDK documentation for the [`baseline` ping](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/baseline.html).
The following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| glean.baseline.duration |[timespan](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/timespan.html) |The duration of the last foreground session.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1512938#c3)||never |
| glean.baseline.locale |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The locale of the application (e.g. "es-ES").  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1512938#c3)||never |

## glean_client_info
The following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| android_sdk_version |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The optional Android specific SDK version of the software running on this hardware device.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1525606#c14)||never |
| app_build |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The build identifier generated by the CI system (e.g. "1234/A").  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1512938#c3)||never |
| app_channel |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The channel the application is being distributed on.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1520741#c18)||never |
| app_display_version |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The user visible version string (e.g. "1.0.3").  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1508305#c9)||never |
| architecture |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The architecture of the device, (e.g. "arm", "x86").  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1512938#c3)||never |
| client_id |[uuid](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/uuid.html) |A UUID uniquely identifying the client. |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1512938#c3)||never |
| device_manufacturer |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The manufacturer of the device the application is running on.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1512938#c3)||never |
| device_model |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The model of the device the application is running on.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1512938#c3)||never |
| first_run_date |[datetime](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/datetime.html) |The date of the first run of the application.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1525045#c18)||never |
| os |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The name of the operating system.  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1512938#c3)||never |
| os_version |[string](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/string.html) |The user-visible version of the operating system (e.g. "1.2.3").  |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1512938#c3)||never |

## metrics
This is a built-in ping that is assembled out of the box by the Glean SDK.
See the Glean SDK documentation for the [`metrics` ping](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/pings/metrics.html).
The following metrics are added to the ping:

| Name | Type | Description | Data reviews | Extras | Expiration |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| glean.core.migration.successful |[boolean](https://mozilla.github.io/glean/book/user/metrics/boolean.html) |Reports `true` if the client was successfully migrated from the Android-specific implementation of the Glean SDK to the cross-platform one. |[1](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1582099#c4)||2020-03-31 |
